title: Finally the Featured Game Mode rotation is here!
body:
L4T3NCY has been saying "I'm totally up for this" for a long time now, and we're finally getting it! I'm so happy :3

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/announcing-rotating-game-mode-queue

https://i.gyazo.com/11e92d900bf67cead30900fcef265895.png

replies.body: I know! Its so exciting! The urf thing is... very disappointing and confusing. But a rotating game mode is something league has been needing and deserving for forever now and its happening~ {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
Don't be confused Prince bro! Ask me questions if you want. <3

> [{quoted}](name=L4T3NCY,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=m6mrA69O,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-03-07T22:39:39.816+0000)
>
> Don't be confused Prince bro! Ask me questions if you want. <3

Well its just that urf is a tradition. Its like someone announced that Christmas wouldnt be on the 25th this year, Or halloween is now in November? 
Don't get me wrong I'm so pumped for a game mode queue! It's so awesome this is happening, and I know you have been a huge supporter for ages. This is kinda a separate issue but it was all in the same announcement.

The 'Ultra Rapid Fire mode' was actually only the last 2 years, whereas URF the character has been around in some form since 2010 when he first had an "accident" with Warwick. :/ I feel you dude, but don't worry, URF mode will return eventually with this queue. ^.^b
Is this rotation a, "Weekend only" thing?  Or does the featured game mode last through out the week?

Initially the queue will be available across weekends, but we're flexible on the timing (EG: Fri to Mon or something similar) while also being conscious of different timezones. Mode rotations will be weekly. _Exact timings are still TBD_, but we're building it to be extensible if need be.

I apologize, I should've added this into my original comment -

Does that mean featured games, that we'd typically get for two weeks, are only going to last 4-8 days now?  I'm basing this off of "but we are ready to share that Ultra Rapid Fire will appear at least twice in 2016.", and to assume that other featured game modes are only going to appear roughly twice?

That's the idea, modes will be in the queue for shorter bursts, but have a _dramatically_ increased appearance rate compared to before. EG: The most modes we ever did previously in 1 year, was 7. This queue will let us get you guys 7 bursts of game modes in just the first 7 weeks.

The goal is for you guys to have more access to more of your favourite modes, more of the time. More more more. :)

> [{quoted}](name=L4T3NCY,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=m6mrA69O,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-07T23:51:34.017+0000)
>
> That's the idea, modes will be in the queue for shorter bursts, but have a _dramatically_ increased appearance rate compared to before. EG: The most modes we ever did previously in 1 year, was 7. This queue will let us get you guys 7 bursts of game modes in just the first 7 weeks.
> 
> The goal is for you guys to have more access to more of your favourite modes, more of the time. More more more. :)

Basically, it's great that RIOT is going to rotate through the game modes, but it's terrible that the game mode is going to change weekly.  That's just too short of a time to properly enjoy a particular game mode.  You can't tell your friends about the fun games you had over the last weekend and enjoy that game mode with them the next weekend and if you don't play your favorite mode on the particular weekend it's available you just miss it altogether.  Take URF for example.  It sounds like URF will be available for two random weekends out of the entire year and I'm thinking, "Well, if I just happen to not be able to play on the particular weekend or weekends URF is available that is going to really suck".

I think changing the game weekly is the  best approach as people get bored or start complaining a lot as the event last longer. Taking URF as an example, last year URF was extended multiple times, I think it lasted for just about or over 2 weeks, people started complaining of how boring and unfun it got as everyone would just play the same like 15 champions, spamming the zz'rot/banner build to have super strong pushing power, and now that game mdoe becomes dull, until they take it down an re-release it
I'm really glad you guys are doing this, but I can't see the benefit of making it weekends-only.
So just a question on the new queue if a new game mode were to ever surface, would it get its own special queue for a while before worming its way into the grasp of rotation queue?

Not sure if you guys have made a list or talked about which game modes are going to be in the rotation, but I was just wondering if Doom Bots would be in there? I really thought that was an interesting game mode and really liked it, and if so do you plan on adding more bots to the mode? There has been a lot of new champions that came out since Doom bots came out and you could probably do some crazy fun ideas for some.

So, essentially, we'll only have 4 days (Fri. - Mon.) to play URF until it comes up again in the latter half of the year for another 4 days? 

Don't get me wrong, I like the idea of featured game modes on a rotation, but personally I don't know if 8 days a year of URF will be enough time for me to truly enjoy all the fun and possibilities it has to offer :(
